name: Rest House III - Chlorophilia
description:
Explore Rest House III intriguing world and step into a dark and wet Chlorophilia. Psychological first person adventure.
All the population moved to the capital. You are special correspondent of the famous journal.

Features & Highlights
•Explore a breathtaking world
Walk freely across 3D levels.
Travel between areas and wind your way through as soon as you unlock the secret areas.

•Immersive, visuals
Experience a world art, drawn and animated by hand with compositing 3D techniques and camera work.
Immersive aesthetic, modernizing the adventure genre.


Disaster! What will happen to the earth in the future?
Social-psychological about all-time and everyday human dilemmas, fears, and needs. A dystopia exciting fiction: something for everyone...
One possible version of the future, but not ideal society, in which everyone is still looking for their place. Hidden Story of human existence with question:
What are the values of the modern world?
